EmailTemplate.name: Contract Agreement Approval Request
EmailTemplate.subject: A Request for Your Review and Approval of a Contract Agreement {!APXT_Redlining__Contract_Agreement__c.Name} has been submitted
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
A request for your Review and Approval has been submitted for the following Contract Agreement: {!APXT_Redlining__Contract_Agreement__c.Name} - {!APXT_Redlining__Contract_Agreement__c.APXT_Redlining__Account__c}.
You can review changes to the Contract Agreement by clicking on {!APXT_Redlining__Contract_Agreement__c.Link}.
You can approve the request by clicking on {!ApprovalRequest.Internal_URL}. Thank you!
